contentList:
Silver Wyrmling Staff The cold emanating from this staff seems to suck all heat from the air, never once chilling the dark wood.
Ruby Wyrmling Staff The force resonating through this staff seems to vibrate the air, never once breaking the dark wood.
Bronze Wyrmling Staff The lightning charging this staff seems to electrify the air, never once shocking the dark wood.
Diamond Wyrmling Staff The radiance emitting from this staff seems to light up the air, never once brightening the dark wood.
Emerald Wyrmling Staff The necrosis spreading through this staff seems to descrate the air, never once rotting the dark wood.
Amethyst Wyrmling Staff The psychosis permeating this staff seems to travel through thin air, never once weakening the dark wood.
Copper Wyrmling Staff The acid coating this staff seems to make the air around it acrid, never once eroding the dark wood.
Green Wyrmling Staff The poison dripping from this staff seems to suffuse the air, never once enfusing the dark wood.
Red Wyrmling Staff The flame enveloping this staff seems to feed off thin air, never once singeing the dark wood.
Sapphire Wyrmling Staff The thunder contained within this staff seems to shake the air, never once affecting the dark wood.
Gold Great Wyrm Staff The combined power of Ansur, Heart of the Gate, and Kereska, draconic goddess of arcane knowledge, imbues this staff with elemental energy. As a great man once said: "Fire".
Silver Great Wyrm Staff The combined power of Ansur, Heart of the Gate, and Kereska, draconic goddess of arcane knowledge, imbues this staff with elemental energy. The cold never bothered you anyway.
Ruby Great Wyrm Staff The combined power of Ansur, Heart of the Gate, and Kereska, draconic goddess of arcane knowledge, imbues this staff with elemental energy. The force will surround you, penetrate you, and bind Faerun together.
Bronze Great Wyrm Staff The combined power of Ansur, Heart of the Gate, and Kereska, draconic goddess of arcane knowledge, imbues this staff with elemental energy. Lightning Bolts will shoot from your finger tips.
Diamond Great Wyrm Staff The combined power of Ansur, Heart of the Gate, and Kereska, draconic goddess of arcane knowledge, imbues this staff with elemental energy. Soon, there will be far more than four lights.
Emerald Great Wyrm Staff The combined power of Ansur, Heart of the Gate, and Kereska, draconic goddess of arcane knowledge, imbues this staff with elemental energy. {{- /* TODO */ -}}
Amethyst Great Wyrm Staff The combined power of Ansur, Heart of the Gate, and Kereska, draconic goddess of arcane knowledge, imbues this staff with elemental energy. {{- /* TODO */ -}}
Copper Great Wyrm Staff The combined power of Ansur, Heart of the Gate, and Kereska, draconic goddess of arcane knowledge, imbues this staff with elemental energy. You'll be able to channel levels of toxicity unheard of in this genre.
Green Great Wyrm Staff The combined power of Ansur, Heart of the Gate, and Kereska, draconic goddess of arcane knowledge, imbues this staff with elemental energy. Your opponents will fall victim to one of the classic blunders: not developing an immunity to poison.
Sapphire Great Wyrm Staff The combined power of Ansur, Heart of the Gate, and Kereska, draconic goddess of arcane knowledge, imbues this staff with elemental energy. You will become a seductive lord of thunder.
Once per combat, your staff will allow you to cast this using a bonus action instead of an action. Once per short rest, your staff will allow you to cast this using a bonus action instead of an action.
{{ range $cantrip, $values := $.QuickenedCantrips }} Quickened {{.Title}} You can use your staff to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="{{.SpellType}}_MAG_{{$cantrip}}_Staff">{{.Title}}</LSTag> using a bonus action instead of an action. Usable once per {{ if $.Balance.QuickenedCantripsPerCombat }}combat{{else}}short rest{{end}}. {{ end }}
